required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Therapeutic Effect of Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulaton on Tinnitus
clinical_study.official_title: Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation (rTMS) Effect on Tinnitus

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation (rTMS) is effective in the treatment of tinnitus.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.time_frame: Before (- six months) and after (+ 5 days) rTMS interventions
primary_outcome.description: Primary outcomes will be measured twice. One is before, and the other is after 5-day rTMS interventions. Baseline primary outcome will be acceptable if it is done within the prior 6 months of 1st rTMS. Follow-up primary outcome will be done within the five days after 5th rTMS.

arm_group.description: Real rTMS is real continuous theta burst stimulation.
Sham rTMS is sham continuous theta burst stimulation.

intervention.description: This sham stimulation is not true stimulation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjective tinnitus
- Age 18 years and older
Exclusion Criteria:
- Meniere, conductive hearing loss, objective tinnitus
- History of seizure disorder or epilepsy
- Clinically relevant psychiatric comorbidity
- Previous symptomatic stroke
- Surgically or traumatically implanted foreign bodies such as a pacemaker, an implanted medication pump, a metal plate in the skull, or metal inside the skull or eyes (other than dental appliances or fillings), intracardiac lines that may pose a physical hazard during magnetic stimulation

facility.name: Department of Neurology, and Department of Otorhinolaryngology-Head & Neck Surgery Dongtan Sacred Heart Hospital
